```{r}
i=1
for(i in 1:100){
if(i%%3==0 & !i%%5==0){print("fizz")} 
else if(i%%5==0 & !i%%3==0){print("buzz")} 
else if(i%%3==0 & i%%5==0){print("fizzbuzz")}
else{print(i)}
}
```

```{r}
for (i in 1:100) {
 if (i %% 3 == 0 & i %% 5 == 0) {print("FizzBuzz")}
 else if (i %% 3 == 0) {print("Fizz")}
 else if (i %% 5 == 0) {print("Buzz")}
 else print(i)
}
```
